snippet: Amazon.com Inc posted a much larger-than-expected loss in the second quarter as it continues its rapid pace of investment in new businesses such as digital content and consumer electronics....

headline.print_headline: Amazon's Heavy Investing Eats Into Bottom Line, Shares Drop
headline.main: Amazon's Heavy Investing Eats Into Bottom Line, Shares Drop

lead_paragraph: Amazon.com Inc posted a much larger-than-expected loss in the second quarter as it continues its rapid pace of investment in new businesses such as digital content and consumer electronics.
